pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_mlops
pipelines.pipeline: multifilesrc loop=TRUE location=/home/pipeline-server/resources/videos/welding.avi name=source ! h264parse ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification model-instance-id=inst0 ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_s3write
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification model-instance-id=inst0 ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification model-instance-id=inst0 ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvawatermark ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination
